title: Determine Life Trajectory
description: Assess personal goals and values to identify your desired life path.

steps.description: Reflect on your passions, values, and long-term goals.

title: Spiritual Framework: A Rough Draft
description: An outline for a formal doctrine that organizes spiritual beliefs and practices.

steps.description: Reflect on the interplay of principles to shape the framework effectively.
Define core beliefs, key texts, and outline the purpose of your spiritual practice.
Include personal experiences that shaped your spiritual understanding.
Describe rituals and practices that support your beliefs.
Address ethical considerations and moral principles.
Explore the connection between spirituality and personal growth.
Review and revise the document based on feedback and reflection.
